entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Sachs Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:21 a.m. MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sachs Harbour Airport 9:00 AM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

Visibility: 3 km

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Blowing snow late in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
